Prototype Projects

Here's a peek at a few small prototypes or tech demos I've created. Some of these may turn into completed games at a later date. Projects are ordered roughly in terms of scope and complexity.

Birdened

2016-2018

Narrative based Action-Platformer

Bongo Cowbellie

2018-

Parody shooter created as a hybrid of Banjo-Kazooie, Hotline Miami, Moon Patrol and others.

Seasonal

2015-

Animal Crossing/Links Awakening Hybrid created to explore a colour palette covering 4 seasons

Kinged

2018-

Rhythm-based grid strategy game about commanding and encouraging a group of 'friends' to assist you
